attributes.additional_details: To help keep everyone safe. Stop these groups of bullies to help make social media a safer place. No one should be subjected to hate speech and made to suffer. These bullies should be made accountable for their actions
attributes.background: To make it against the law for people and groups to do this. It's a crime and affects people terribly

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to know the Government plans to introduce a new Online Harms Bill, a set of measures to keep UK internet users safe online. You can read more about the latest update on the Government's plans here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/oliver-dowdens-oral-statement-on-the-online-harms-white-paper-consultation-response

You might also like to sign the following petitions:

Make online abuse of disabled people a specific criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551468

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575833
